issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Run Mashups > Facebook > Publish Stream 
3. Login to facebook
4. Click on Publish wall post with DIALOG
5. Rotate the device to landscape
6. Scroll the content

Actual Result:
See that the entire button column moves up and you cannot view the content, see image

Expected Result:
Should be able to scroll to view the content

Note:
Does not happen on iPhone 3 (3.1.3) and iPhone 4 (4.3.3)
fields.summary: iOS: Facebook publish dialog scroll in landscape mode is not scrolling content
fields.environment: ipod touch 4GT (4.1) Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 00:38 f8dfdf7...)

comments.body: Reports indicate this may be invalid; will look into it.

Didn't witness this behavior, although the "Skip/Publish" bar renders at odd times (only when you finish scrolling). This is a facebook bug on the webservice side though and we can do nothing about it.

In fact, any visual behavior of the dialog is a facebook bug we can do nothing about.
